ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:35:22 [Issue ID 4000-619637] urn:comicvine:4000-619637 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:23:45. [Issue ID 1732375]
ComicInfo.Summary:
When the villainous ARCADE decides to build a second, even deadlier Murderworld in Madripoor, he kidnaps Spider-Man and forces him to be the park's first guest!
Deadpool, meanwhile, has a bone to pick with Arcade... Namely that his terrifying theme parks are besmirching murder and its good name!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Will Robson & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Venomized Villains Variant Cover (Itsy Bitsy) | Ed McGuinness & Edgar Delgado | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: One Night In Madripoor Makes Spider-Man Humble
